member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.IsInputFormatSupported(SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat,SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat,SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat@)
member.summary: Queries if a specific input format is supported for a given output format.
member.param: Input format to check for being supported.

If not NULL, and the input format is not supported for the given output format, ppSupportedInputFormat returns a pointer to the closest input format that is supported. Use {{XAPOFree}} to free the returned structure.
member.unmanaged: HRESULT IXAPO::IsInputFormatSupported([None] const WAVEFORMATEX* pOutputFormat,[None] const WAVEFORMATEX* pRequestedInputFormat,[Out, Optional] WAVEFORMATEX** ppSupportedInputFormat)

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.IsOutputFormatSupported(SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat,SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat,SharpDX.Multimedia.WaveFormat@)
member.summary: Queries if a specific output format is supported for a given input format.
member.param: [in] Output format to check for being supported.

[out] If not NULL and the output format is not supported for the given input format, ppSupportedOutputFormat returns a pointer to the closest output format that is supported. Use {{XAPOFree}} to free the returned structure.
member.unmanaged: HRESULT IXAPO::IsOutputFormatSupported([None] const WAVEFORMATEX* pInputFormat,[None] const WAVEFORMATEX* pRequestedOutputFormat,[Out, Optional] WAVEFORMATEX** ppSupportedOutputFormat)

member.unmanaged: HRESULT IXAPO::Initialize([In, Buffer, Optional] const void* pData,[None] UINT32 DataByteSize)

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.Reset
member.summary: Resets variables dependent on frame history.

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.LockForProcess(SharpDX.XAPO.LockParameters[],SharpDX.XAPO.LockParameters[])
member.summary: Called by XAudio2 to lock the input and output configurations of an XAPO allowing it to do any final initialization before {{Process}} is called on the realtime thread.
member.param: Array of input structures.pInputLockedParameters may be NULL if InputLockedParameterCount is 0, otherwise itmust have InputLockedParameterCount elements.
Array of output structures.pOutputLockedParameters may be NULL if OutputLockedParameterCount is 0, otherwise itmust have OutputLockedParameterCount elements.
member.unmanaged: HRESULT IXAPO::LockForProcess([None] UINT32 InputLockedParameterCount,[In, Buffer, Optional] const XAPO_LOCKFORPROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS* pInputLockedParameters,[None] UINT32 OutputLockedParameterCount,[In, Buffer, Optional] const XAPO_LOCKFORPROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS* pOutputLockedParameters)

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.UnlockForProcess
member.summary: Deallocates variables that were allocated with the {{LockForProcess}} method.

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.Process(SharpDX.XAPO.BufferParameters[],SharpDX.XAPO.BufferParameters[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Runs the XAPO's digital signal processing (DSP) code on the given input and output buffers.
member.param: [in, out] Output array of structures. On input, the value of .ValidFrameCount indicates the number of frames that the XAPO should write to the output buffer. On output, the value of .ValidFrameCount indicates the actual number of frames written.
TRUE to process normally; FALSE to process thru. See Remarks for additional information.
member.unmanaged: void IXAPO::Process([None] UINT32 InputProcessParameterCount,[In, Buffer, Optional] const XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS* pInputProcessParameters,[None] UINT32 OutputProcessParameterCount,[InOut, Buffer, Optional] XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS* pOutputProcessParameters,[None] BOOL IsEnabled)

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.CalcInputFrames(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of input frames required to generate the given number of output frames.
member.param: The number of output frames desired.

member.name: M:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.CalcOutputFrames(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of output frames that will be generated from a given number of input frames.

member.name: P:SharpDX.XAPO.AudioProcessor.RegistrationProperties
member.summary: Returns the registration properties of an XAPO.
member.returns: a structure containing theregistration properties the XAPO was created with; use XAPOFree to free thestructure.
